title: Friday I'm in Love
description: Ewan is finished being pushed aside by the sexy, but elusive Natalie. He intends to show her exactly what she’s been missing by rebuffing his advances.Natalie should have turned down Ewan’s unorthodox proposal, but she’s tired of celebrating birthdays alone and a week of wild nights might be just what she needs.Friday I’m in Love is the fifth book in New York Times bestselling author Mari Carr’s Wild Irish series.
author: Mari Carr
